description:
Job Description

Core Responsibilities:

  • Plan and execute all shipping and receiving functions.
  • Ensure vendor and customer product safety through proper packaging and continuous risk management.
  • Ensure all hazardous materials are properly received, stored, and documented.
  • Maintain the accuracy of the ERP system through accurate data entry and proper documentation for all shipping and receiving activities.
  • Manage and execute all related quality functions pertaining to packaging, storage, and transportation.
  • Track, record, and analyze packaging, and transportation vendor performance to ensure continuous improvement and cost-effectiveness.
  • Provide guidance and direction to others in the department as needed.

Education, Experience & Skills Requirements:

  • High School diploma or equivalent
  • Minimum 5 years of experience in shipping related functions
  • Effective verbal, written, and communication skills
  • Computer Experience including MS Office, Vantage Epicor ERP system experience a plus

Physical Limitations:

  • Bending, pulling, pushing, sitting, and reaching
  • Lifting up to 50 pounds regularly and 75 pounds occasionally
  • Standing for up to 8 hours per day
  • Read, write and communicate in English

Key Skills and Attributes:

  • Positive work ethic and attitude
  • Desire to learn, understand and succeed
  • Detail-oriented
  • Team Player
